Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:[\w+=/,.@-]+:[\w+=/,.@-]+:[\w+=/,.@-]*:[0-9]*:[\w+=,.@-]+(/[\w+=,.@-]+)*  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,128}$.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
